disease: Chronic viral hepatitis B without delta-agent

symptoms.name: Yellowing of skin and eyes
symptoms.pattern: May not appear until years after infection

symptoms.name: Dark yellow urine
symptoms.pattern: May not appear until years after infection

symptoms.name: Diarrhoea
symptoms.pattern: May not appear until years after infection

symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.pattern: May not appear until years after infection

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.pattern: May not appear until years after infection

symptoms.name: Nausea
symptoms.pattern: May not appear until years after infection

symptoms.name: Joint pain
symptoms.pattern: May not appear until years after infection

symptoms.name: Abdominal pain
symptoms.pattern: May not appear until years after infection

risk_factors: Contact with blood, semen, and other body fluids from an HBV-infected person
